SharedRegions

Class BaggageCollectionPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • SharedRegions.BaggageCollectionPoint

  • public class BaggageCollectionPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Baggage Collection Point shared region. The passengers can collect their bags from the convoy belt.

      Baggage Collection Point's instanciation

    • Method Detail

      • carryItToAppropriateStore

        public void carryItToAppropriateStore(Bag bag)
        The porter unlocks the passenger 'x' that the id appears in the bag
        Parameters:
        bag - the bag to be carried by the porter

      • goCollectABag

        public boolean goCollectABag()
        The passenger collects a bag. All passengers are blocked until the bag x unlocks individually the respective passenger. The bag from passenger X needs to be in the conveyor belt.

      • setMoreBags

        public void setMoreBags(boolean moreBags)
        Sets the more bags variable to tell if there's more bags at the plane's hold
        Parameters:
        moreBags -

      • getRetrieved

        public Bag[] getRetrieved(int id)
        Retreives a passenger id's bag
        Parameters:
        id - -> the id of the passenger
        Returns:

        public void storeBag(int id,
                     Bag[] sBags)
        Stores passenger bags on the convoy belt
        Parameters:

      • removeBag

        public void removeBag(int id)
        Removes the bag from the convoy belt
        Parameters:
